page.title: 14Landorn Kennels.
page.content: {Landorn Kennels} open at 8:30 to the public and close at 6:00p.m.,but the owner,his wife and the kennel maid begin work at 6.45 a.m. The {cats} are fed twice a day with meat and pellets.Milk and water are available all the time.The {dogs} are fed once a day with several types of meat.Any type of dog or cat are accepted,with {labradors} being the most popular breed. The kennels can hold up to 52 dogs and 50 cats.The most common staying time is one to two weeks. These particular kennels have been recommended by several vets and this has resulted in a booming business.
